alert.note: Alert for Clay; Craighead; Cross; Greene; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 1:58PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet and snow accumulations up to two inches. Ice accumulations of one quarter to one half of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Cross, Greene, Poinsett, Craighead and Clay Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep extra blankets, food, water and a flashlight in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
